meanings.definition: Self-assertive or proud to an irritating degree.
meanings.sent1: Her bumptiousness attitude often rubbed people the wrong way.
meanings.sent2: The bumptiousness boy always boasted about his achievements.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bumptiousness behavior, he was still well-liked by his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her bumptiousness nature made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to address the bumptiousness student's disruptive behavior.

meanings.definition: The quality of being self-assertive or proud to an irritating degree.
meanings.sent1: His bumptiousness was evident in the way he spoke about himself.
meanings.sent2: The team captain's bumptiousness often overshadowed his leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The bumptiousness of the peacock's strut amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The bumptiousness of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The bumptiousness of the lion's roar echoed through the savannah.
